Description: Landscape with Tobias and the angel; Tobias wrestling with a fish on the left bank of a river which passes beneath a bridge and into the right foreground, two figures in a boat, deer amid trees on the further bank, a temple in the distance at left. 1670 Pen and brown ink, with grey wash
Curator's comments: A study for the painting of 1663 in the Hermitage, St Petersburg which is recorded as No. 160 in the 'Liber Veritatis' (BM inv. no. 1957,1214.166). For a study for the painting's pendant also in the Hermitage, 'Landscape with the Rest on the Flight to Egypt' of 1661, see BM inv. no. 1895,0915.902. The handling of both is notable for the smooth handling of the pen and even application of wash, although the present is more monochromatic. Lit.: A.M. Hind, 'Catalogue of the Drawings of Claude Lorrain preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings', London, 1926, no. 286; M. Roethlisberger, 'Claude Lorrain: The drawings catalog', 2 vols, Berkeley and Los Angeles, 1968, no. 1015.
Bibliographic references: Hind 1926 / Catalogue of the Drawings of Claude Lorrain in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (286)
